channel.title: [317] Why Does My Sprites Do This? [PHOTO]
channel.description:
I had the newer version of the RS chatbox. I wanted to change it back to 317 for a more older look. This happens when I switch the sprites around. Why?
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/ERRORSPRITES.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/ERRORSPRITES.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: [317] Why Does My Sprites Do This? [PHOTO]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Maybe its because who ever wanted to change the text box didn’t use the right size for it…just saying

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Why Does My Sprites Do This? [PHOTO]

item.title: [317] Why Does My Sprites Do This? [PHOTO]
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

instead of making the client load images of the sprites, just go into the client and remove all the customs sprites by commenting out the code. That’s what I did. Just loads it from the cache, which is better to do anyways.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Why Does My Sprites Do This? [PHOTO]
